events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position and the candidate's resume shows relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorized under the engineering cluster due to the candidate's background in software development and cloud engineering skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process and to schedule the interviews.
Initial screening call completed; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software architecture and DevOps practices relevant to our current projects.
The candidate responded promptly to interview scheduling requests and expressed enthusiasm about the role and the company's technology stack.
Technical interview has been scheduled with the senior engineering team for next week to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
